item.title: 【Helpdesk】How to play 12 channel WAV 360RA on modern hardware?
item.description:
Hi folks, I have a question:
I got a Sony HT-A9 system and Zidoo Z20 Pro media server.
Tech specs saying that the Sony HT-A9 emulates 12 phantom speakers.
The Zidoo media player has audio passtrough enabeled and when I use
the internal media browser or music player nothing happening, only a warning that the song is skipped due to missing codec.
I use for example one of the 12 channel WAV files wich has 360RA audio:
https://sharemania.us/threads/victo...eg-h-3d-audio-wav-decoded-12-channels.236159/
Now I have installed VLC media player and I am able to play those 12 channel files but did not really hear the atmospherics from the recording studio, it looks like the rear speakers are not in use.
Any tech help would be appreciated.
item.author: 0dayuser
